item.title: Data wrangling with dplyr, tidyr and gsub()
item.description: During my semester 1 in year two, I was given the opportunity to take part in Watson analytic competition which organised by IBM annually. Overall, it was a pleasant experience and I did learnt a lot of things from it. One of it is how to make use of R in wrangling datasets. It was my first time to join and words canâ€™t explain my feelings and gratitude to my academic advisor for her approach, guidance and patience.
